level.text: A list of licensed caterers shall be sent by the Board at the beginning of the (i) renewal period, (ii) the second year payment period, and (iii) the third year payment period for Caterers’ licenses to the following groups:
The list of licensed caterers shall contain the legal name and trade name of the licensee and the licensee’s address of record.
The list shall be sent to the ANC by first-class mail and addressed to the following persons:
The ANC office, with a copy for each ANC member;
The ANC chairperson, at his or her home address of record; and
Each ANC members at his or her home address of record.
The list of licensed caterer’s shall also be published by the Board in the District of Columbia Register.
A list of Caterers licensed to sell alcoholic beverages shall be made available to the public by ABRA upon request.
